Synopsis:
----------
Under the icy surface , survivors of Colony Seven struggling as food supplies diminish and temperatures continue to drop. Plagued by illness and internal conflict , the colonists suspect the worst when mysteriously lose contact with Colony Five - the only other known establishment . Sam ( Zegers ) , a mechanic with strong character with a tragic past , joins a team led by Briggs ( Fishburne ) on a dangerous expedition to find out what happened . After a hellish journey , they discover a far worse threat than imagined , and now Colonia Siete should win a fierce battle to preserve the last of humanity.
